org.opendaylight.controller.sal.flowprogrammer

Interface IPluginInFlowProgrammerService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FlowProgrammerAdapter, FlowProgrammerService, FlowProgrammerService

    public interface IPluginInFlowProgrammerService
    This interface defines the flow programmer methods to be implemented by protocol plugins

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      • syncSendBarrierMessage

        Status syncSendBarrierMessage(Node node)
        Send Barrier message synchronously. The caller will be blocked until the Barrier reply arrives.
        Parameters:
        node - the network node Node
        Returns:
        Status the operation status Status

      • asyncSendBarrierMessage

        Status asyncSendBarrierMessage(Node node)
        Send Barrier message asynchronously. The caller is not blocked.
        Parameters:
        node - the network node Node
        Returns:
        Status the operation status Status
